column3:
“Got this at Old Toby in Chehalis, WA.  Check my blog out AgingEnt.com


--
Brand: Orgrow
Strain: Skunk 47
Indica

Potency Analysis: TTL 22.5% THC 0.18% CBD 0.32% THCA 21.6%

Harvested: 12/09/2014
Smoked: 06/16/2015

Packaging: 5x3.5" mylar-back 10mil plastic zip top bag

column2: this was a decent weed.  It reminded me very much of any of the variety of standard buds that passe...”"

column3: “A spicy skunky mix that will help your relax and slow thing down.”

“the Phenotype I grew has a Strong Peach flavor 
and Big Colas”
“retro.   what I remember weed being like when I was younger.   stoney.”

“Loved this strain as its great for my diabetic retinopathy and it is good for sleeping. Smells pretty nice with a spicy and earthy smell. got mine from Orgrow and I got one 3.5g bud that had a decent trim job. It had a THC content of 23% and I think .3 cbd.”

“The only Indica-dominant that hasn't made me severely unwell! This is definitely one for the ladies as it is excellent for menstruaion nausea and cramps! 100% a menstrual smoke! And it increases your arousal tenfold! My boyfriend likes this strain for more reasons than it helping with his depression and generally being a beautiful smoke. Says Indica but I don't believe it...

Skunk 47 is possibly my second favourite ...”

“World of Seeds Bank - Skunk 47
Skunk 47 is the result of crossing Skunk#1 mother, which was the first real indica-sativa hybrid comprising Afghan, Mexican and Colombian genetics and which changed the face of cannabis culture across the globe, with the famous AK 47, mainly sativa hybrid that has an ultra quick flowering cycle and a very fruity taste. Although, the genetics of both are similar in many respects, by cros...”
“Nice uplifting high for an indica dominant strain. Has a nice body relaxing sensation”

“The only Indica-dominant that hasn't made me severely unwell! This is definitely one for the ladies as it is excellent for menstruaion nausea and cramps! 100% a menstrual smoke! And it increases your arousal tenfold! My boyfriend likes this strain for more reasons than it helping with his depression and generally being a beautiful smoke. Says Indica but I don't believe it...

Skunk 47 is possibly my second favourite ...”
“Nice uplifting high for an indica dominant strain. Has a nice body relaxing sensation”

“Primarily a fan of sativa I thought I'd mix it up and give this strain with such a demanding name a whirl. The flowers smell awesome and I was excited to spark this bud. First off the taste wasn't as expected, nothing really notable or something I would call good but it was descent. Typically I like strains that keep me motivated or interested in doing something. This put me in direct couch lock. Staring at the tv un...”
“Has a odd flavor via vaping.  Kind of like shaving cream.   It's relaxing, but seem like we need to vap a lot to get there.”
“Really nice relaxing high.”
“this is a great strange for board games or cleaning and I would definitely get it again”
“GREAT for Pain  and  sleep”

“Doesn't quite have the old school knock out skunk taste n smell but it does provide a nice bit of relief from aches n pains.
A great strain for day or night that doesn't try to wear fancy fruity camoflage”
“Cool relaxing effect, not much of a yield since it was auto but still good.”
“I loved this Strain it wasn't a heavy high but it was the perfect high for a board game or cleaning the house and I would get it again in a heartbeat!”
“Excellent high. I feel much better after a couple of hits of this! Super relaxing, great for needing sleep, yet a giggly, happy high at the same time for me. Major helper with pain!”
“Makes you very relaxed, Nice body high and good for rainy days when you don't want to leave the couch.”
“Pleasant. Happy. Tired later, but it was a great hi for day also. If you wanna go you go, if you don't you can relax. Smoke can be harsh- just a tad. But tastes great.”
“Really good, Up for a while, super relax and uplifting, no pain good sleep, really nice indica.”

“What a beautiful lime green strain that I would definitely recommend it for night time smoking. Very sedating, relaxing and definitely good for pain, depression and insomnia. 22% and smells delicious”
“awesome oldschool strain. not quite 5 star quad AAAA b7t its and old favourite for a lot of people.”

“Total cannabinoids 22.5 thc&thca 22.1  activated 19.5 
 Thought it was pretty just mid grade Chronicle what I used to get that was great  10 years ago but now it's just pretty regular it does work a lot better than it looks though (gets the job done still)
Got in clarkston wa at greenfield”
